channel.title: Vodafone Free Internet

item.title: Vodafone offers prepaid customers 90GB 4G data & unlimited voice calls for 6 Months in Rs 399 plan
item.author: invalid@example.com (riyan18999)
item.dc:creator: riyan18999
item.content:encoded: Vodafone India has now come up with a new plan for its prepaid users. Under the new plan, Vodafone users will get 90 GB of 4G data for 6 months along with voice calling facility at Rs 399. Although in some circles, this data could be 84GB with validity of 84 days, which in effect means 1 GB data per day.

item.title: Vodafone Launches Plan With 1GB Daily Data, Unlimited Calls for 84 Days at Rs. 496
item.author: invalid@example.com (hack4u)
item.dc:creator: hack4u
item.content:encoded:
Vodafone has launched two new plans for prepaid customers seeking 1GB daily data allocation and free calls. While one plan is aimed at those looking for a long-term recharge, the other has validity of 28 days only. Vodafone said in a media statement that the plans are available for existing customers as well as MNP users. These new plans have been launched a week afterReliance Jio updatted its tariff plans to raise the...

Vodafone Launches Plan With 1GB Daily Data, Unlimited Calls for 84 Days at Rs. 496

item.title: VODAFONE DIRECT UNLIMITED 3G TRICK
item.author: invalid@example.com (pswalia4u)
item.dc:creator: pswalia4u
item.content:encoded:
[PRO]
1.First make sure you have a 3 months old sim and 0 balance so that you can take a loan.

2.Then Take 5 rs or 10 rs loan from your Vodafone Sim.
3.Then remove it for 48 hrs from mobile. After 48 hrs your balance will become negative.
4.Vodafone do not cap speed in negative balance so you can use free internet.
5. Your balance must be negative to use this trick.
6.Confirmed working in kerela without 3g plan. and with 3g FUP plan in Haryana sim only.
7.Enjoy !!
Note :- This trick is...

VODAFONE DIRECT UNLIMITED 3G TRICK
